about.title: About Boiler.click
about.description: A comprehensive, production-ready boilerplate built with modern technologies. Perfect for launching your next SaaS application with authentication, database management, and beautiful UI components out of the box.

botid.title: BotID Advanced Bot Detection
botid.description: Vercel's built-in bot detection system that automatically protects your application
features: Automatic bot detection using machine learning
No configuration or API keys required

performance.title: Advanced Performance Optimizations
features: Automatic code splitting and lazy loading

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Boiler.click, we believe that every developer should have access to high-quality, production-ready tools that accelerate their development process. Our mission is to eliminate the repetitive setup work that often delays the launch of innovative SaaS applications.
mission.goal: We provide a comprehensive, modern boilerplate that includes everything you need to build and deploy a full-stack SaaS application. From authentication and database management to beautiful UI components and deployment configurations, we've got you covered.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how Boiler.click collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our service.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.personalInfo: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and contact details when you register for our service or contact us.
informationCollection.usageData: We automatically collect information about how you use our service, including pages visited, time spent, and device information.
informationCollection.cookies: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and analyze site performance.

informationUse.title: How We Use Your Information
informationUse.service: To provide, maintain, and improve our services
informationUse.communication: To communicate with you about updates, support, and important notices
informationUse.analytics: To analyze usage patterns and improve our platform
informationUse.security: To protect against fraud and ensure platform security

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
informationSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information only with trusted service providers who assist in operating our platform, and only under strict confidentiality agreements.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.access: You have the right to access your personal information
yourRights.correction: You can request correction of inaccurate information
yourRights.deletion: You may request deletion of your personal information
yourRights.portability: You have the right to data portability

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms

useLicense.restrictions: You may not modify, copy, distribute, transmit, display, perform, reproduce, publish, license, create derivative works from, transfer, or sell any information, software, products, or services obtained from this site.

userAccounts.responsibility: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.
userAccounts.security: You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.
userAccounts.termination: We reserve the right to terminate accounts that violate these terms.

prohibitedUses.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibitedUses.content: You may not use our service for any unlawful purpose or to solicit others to perform unlawful acts, violate any international, federal, provincial, or state rules, laws, or local ordinances, or infringe upon or violate our intellectual property rights or the intellectual property rights of others.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The information on this website is provided on an 'as is' basis. To the fullest extent permitted by law, Boiler.click excludes all representations, warranties, conditions and terms relating to our website and the use of this website.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall Boiler.click, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.introduction: This Cookie Policy explains how Boiler.click uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit our website.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.essential: Essential cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.
howWeUseCookies.analytics: Analytics cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
howWeUseCookies.preferences: Preference cookies remember your choices and settings to provide a more personalized experience.
howWeUseCookies.marketing: Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant and engaging advertisements.

cookieTypes.title: Types of Cookies We Use
cookieTypes.session: Session cookies are temporary and deleted when you close your browser
cookieTypes.persistent: Persistent cookies remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them
cookieTypes.firstParty: First-party cookies are set by our website
cookieTypes.thirdParty: Third-party cookies are set by other websites whose content appears on our site

managingCookies.title: Managing Cookies
managingCookies.browserSettings: You can control and delete cookies through your browser settings.
managingCookies.optOut: You can opt out of certain cookies by adjusting your browser settings or using opt-out tools provided by third-party services.
managingCookies.impact: Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these legal documents, please contact us at:

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about Boiler.click and get help with setup, customization, and development.

questions.question: What is Boiler.click?
questions.answer: Boiler.click is a next-generation full-stack SaaS boilerplate built with modern technologies like Next.js, Prisma, Shadcn/UI, TypeScript, and AI. It provides a complete foundation for building SaaS applications with authentication, database integration, and modern UI components.

questions.question: What technologies are included?
questions.answer: The boilerplate includes Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript, Prisma ORM, Shadcn/UI components, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion for animations, NextAuth.js for authentication, and many other modern tools for building production-ready SaaS applications.

questions.question: How do I get started?
questions.answer:
1. Clone the repository from GitHub
2. Install dependencies with npm install
3. Set up your environment variables
4. Configure your database
5. Run npm run dev to start development

questions.question: Is this boilerplate free?
questions.answer: Yes, Boiler.click is completely free and open-source. You can use it for personal and commercial projects without any restrictions.

questions.question: How do I customize the theme?
questions.answer: The boilerplate uses Tailwind CSS with a custom design system. You can customize colors, fonts, and components by modifying the CSS variables in globals.css and the Tailwind configuration.

questions.question: Can I use this for production?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Boiler.click is designed for production use with proper error handling, performance optimizations, security headers, and best practices built-in.

questions.question: How do I add new features?
questions.answer: The boilerplate is modular and extensible. You can add new pages, components, API routes, and database models following the established patterns and conventions.

questions.question: What databases are supported?
questions.answer: Boiler.click uses Prisma ORM which supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB, and other databases. The default configuration is set up for PostgreSQL.
